testsuite.name: MusicAdvisorTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
An error occurred while retrieving the category list: Access token is incorrect!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -access http://127.0.0.1:56788 -resource http://127.0.0.1:56789 -page 1
> auth Use this link to request the access code: http://127.0.0.1:56788/authorize?client_id=e508e7306ef84fcd9a8769cac582b977&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8080&response_type=code Waiting for authorization code... ---SUCCESS--- Access Token: 456456 Refresh Token: 567567 > categories API Error (401): Invalid access token
